translations: 中世纪的；<非正式>非常老派的，极其过时的

sentences.sentence: It is a perfect example of a medieval castle.
sentences.translation: 这是最典型的中世纪城堡。

sentences.sentence: He began studying politics and medieval history.
sentences.translation: 他开始学习政治学和中世纪史。

sentences.sentence: He was able to pinpoint on the map the site of the medieval village.
sentences.translation: 他能在地图上准确找出那个中世纪村庄的位置。
